cards.title: Dendron
setup: At the start of the game, put {Dendron}'s villain character cards into play, 'Mural of the Forest' side up. Search the deck for 1 copy of Stained Wolf and 1 copy of Painted Viper and put them into play.
gameplay: At the start and end of the villain turn, if there are fewer than {H - 2} tattos in play, play the top card of the villain deck.
When Dendron would be destroyed, flip her villain character cards instead.
cards.advanced: Increase damage dealt by tattoos by 1.
flippedGameplay: When {Dendron} is flipped to this side, restore her to 50 HP and shuffle the villain trash into the deck.
At the start and end of the villain turn, play the top card of the villain deck.
cards.flippedAdvanced: At the start of the villain turn, {Dendron} regains 5 HP.

cards.title: Adorned Oak
cards.body: Reduce damage dealt to Tattoos by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: With a little prompting, the{BR}forest always looks out for its own.

cards.title: Blood Thorn Aura
cards.body: Whenever a Tattoo would be dealt damage by a non-villain target, it first deals that target {H  - 2} radiant damage.

flavorQuotes.text: She kept her{BR}form but lost herself to this power.{BR}I'd say you got the better deal.

cards.title: Choking Inscription
cards.body: The hero with the most cards in hand cannot draw cards during their next turn. The hero with the most cards in play cannot play cards during their next turn. All other heroes shuffle their trash into their decks.

flavorQuotes.text: Get this thing off of me!

cards.title: Dark Design
cards.body: The last hero that dealt damage to a villain target must discard {H} cards from their hand.

flavorQuotes.text: She gave me this{BR}cursed mark, long ago.
Seems we're all of us{BR}older than we look.

cards.title: Ink Scar
cards.body: Shuffle all Tattoos from the villain trash into the villain deck. Play the top 2 cards of the villain deck.

flavorQuotes.text: My works shall not fade so easily.

cards.title: Living Ink
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, each villain target regains 3 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: There are many forms of written magic.

cards.title: Mark of the Writhing Night
body: {Dendron} deals the hero with the highest HP 5 projectile damage and the hero with the lowest HP 2 irreducible infernal damage.
Destroy 1 equipment and 1 ongoing from the hero with the fewest cards in play, and 2 equipment and 2 ongoing cards from the hero with the most cards in play.

flavorQuotes.text: Did you think I was the only one?

cards.title: Obsidian Skin
cards.flavorReference: Absolute Zero to Haka, Freedom Five #1306

cards.title: Painted Viper
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero target with the lowest HP {H - 2} toxic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: It was a painful{BR}process. Let me show you!

cards.flavorReference: Dendron, Mark of the Beast One-Shot

cards.title: Restoration
cards.body: {Dendron} regains 10 HP. Restore all Tattoos to their max HP.

cards.title: Shaded Owl
body: Increase damage dealt by villain targets by 1.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals each hero target 1 sonic damage.

cards.title: Stained Wolf
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero target with the highest HP {H - 1} melee damage.

cards.title: Tinted Stag
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, shuffle the villain trash and reveal cards until you reveal a Tattoo. Put that card into play. Put the rest of the cards back into the villain trash.

flavorQuotes.text: As long as she bears{BR}those marks, they will not{BR}allow her or her creations to die.

cards.title: Ursa Major
body: Reduce damage dealt to this card by 1.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero target with the highest HP 2 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: She has corrupted some{BR}of the most ancient forest{BR}spirits and bound them to her.

cards.flavorReference: Lady of the Wood,{BR}Roots of the World #53

promoCards.title: Dendron
setup: At the start of the game, put {Dendron}'s villain character cards into play, 'Outside The Lines' side up. Search the deck for all copies of Stained Wolf Painted Viper. Place them beneath this card and shuiffle the villain deck.
gameplay: Cards beneath this one have no game text and are not in play.
At the end of the villain turn, if there are no cards beneath this one, flip {Dendron}'s villain character cards. Otherwise, put 2 random cards from beneath this one into play
promoCards.advanced: When {Dendron} flips to this side, she regains 10 HP.
flippedGameplay: At the start of the villain turn, destroy a villain ongoing card. If you do, {Dendron} deals each hero target 2 radiant damage.
Whenever a tattoo would be destroyed, place it beneath this card.
At the start of the villain turn, if there are at least 6 tattoos beneath this card, {Dendron} deals herself 10 toxic damage. Then, flip {Dendron}'s villain character cards.
At the end of the villain turn, play the top card of the villain deck.
promoCards.flippedAdvanced: Increase damage dealt by {Dendron} to hero targets by {H - 2}.
